stochastic_function: lambda weather_outcome: {'rain':0.5,'no rain':0.5} if weather_outcome == 'rain' else {'rain':0.1,'no rain':0.9}

lambda carry_umbrella_decision, weather_outcome: {0:1.0,-2:0.0,-10:0.0} if weather_outcome == 'no rain' and carry_umbrella_decision == 'not carry' else {0:0.01,-2:0.0,-10:0.99} if weather_outcome == 'rain' and carry_umbrella_decision == 'not carry' else {0:0.0,-2:0.99,-10:0.01} if weather_outcome == 'rain' and carry_umbrella_decision == 'carry' else {0:0.0,-2:1.0,-10:0.0}
